review: My 10 year old son and 10 year old cousin set this up while I was at work!  How cool is that!  This is in contrast to the 1st Roku that I bought.  It was very difficult for me to set up.  However, we still use it and it works well 3 years later.  The Fire TV stick is easy and has so many different uses.  Very glad we purchased this!!
author: Linda Snyder

review: So awesome easy to install love all the choices watched movies all day love it

review: The Fire TV Stick is a great product for a average consumer because it has Netflix, Hulu Plus, YouTube, etc for your media needs but for a techie like me it's not perfect because side loading apk files/android apps is pain in the ass, it has no micro SD card slot, and has no google play store because this does run android but has a limited version of amazon fire TV market which has limited apps but perfect for the average consumer.
author: Kazi Begum

review: This device does everything that it says it will do. I set it up in minutes and am thoroughly enjoying the Fire Stick!

review: Does exactly what you want it to do.  Streams Netflix, Amazon Prime and more!  So easy to set up.  A lot of people are complaining that it needs to be plugged into a power source to work, and while it's true, I don't think that's a huge issue.  I have power strips near every TV in my house since the TVs, blue-ray players, and cable boxes all have to be plugged in anyways.  Overall, great product for a great price.
